728566f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Virginia Avenue
728566f-a.text:
Bay Street, north from (No. 1108) near Virginia
Avenue.
May 1, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728566f-a.folder: Bay Street & Virginia Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728567f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Virginia Avenue
728567f-a.text:
Bay Street, at the N.W. corner of Virginia Avenue,
showing St. Marys Roman Catholic School. The view is across
Virginia Avenue toward Bay Street and shows also the steeple
of St. Marys Church.
February 2, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728567f-a.folder: Bay Street & Virginia Avenue, Staten Island, NY
